original_text: Nadab and Abihu were still wearing their robes. Mishael and Elzaphan carried Nadab and Abihu outside the camp. Moses had told them that they must do that.
korean_text: 그들이 나와 모세가 말한 대로 그들을 옷 입은 채 진영 밖으로 메어 내니

sentences.original_text: Nadab and Abihu were still wearing their robes.
sentences.korean_translation: 나답과 아비후는 여전히 그들의 예복을 입고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Mishael and Elzaphan carried Nadab and Abihu
